mapper.sql: id, activity_id, activity_adseat_id, task_type, monitor_date,monitor_last_days,user_id, status,problem_status,sub_created,parent_id,parent_type, verify_time,create_time, update_time,assessor_id,assignor_id,assignor_time,report_time,task_point,task_money,company_id,first_verify,is_assign
mapper.insert: insert into ad_monitor_task (id, activity_id, activity_adseat_id, task_type,monitor_date,monitor_last_days, user_id, status,problem_status,sub_created,parent_id,parent_type, verify_time,create_time, update_time,assessor_id,assignor_id,assignor_time,report_time,task_point,task_money,company_id,first_verify,is_assign) values ( #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityAdseatId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{monitorDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{monitorLastDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{problemStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{subCreated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{verifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{assessorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{assignorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{assignorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{taskPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{firstVerify,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{isAssign,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update ad_monitor_task
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activity_adseat_id = #{activityAdseatId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_type = #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
monitor_date = #{monitorDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
monitor_last_days = #{monitorLastDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
problem_status = #{problemStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sub_created = #{subCreated,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_type = #{parentType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
verify_time = #{verifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
assessor_id = #{assessorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
assignor_id = #{assignorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
assignor_time = #{assignorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
report_time = #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
task_point = #{taskPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_money = #{taskMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
first_verify = #{firstVerify,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_assign = #{isAssign,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ad_monitor_task set activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_adseat_id = #{activityAdseatId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_type = #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, monitor_date = #{monitorDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, monitor_last_days = #{monitorLastDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, problem_status = #{problemStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sub_created = #{subCreated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_type = #{parentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, verify_time = #{verifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, assessor_id = #{assessorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, assignor_id = #{assignorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, assignor_time = #{assignorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, report_time = #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, task_point = #{taskPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_money = #{taskMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, first_verify = #{firstVerify,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_assign = #{isAssign,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into ad_monitor_task ( activity_id, activity_adseat_id, task_type, monitor_date, monitor_last_days, user_id, status, problem_status, sub_created, parent_id, parent_type, verify_time, create_time, update_time, assessor_id, assignor_id, assignor_time, report_time, task_point, task_money ) values
( #{task.activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{task.activityAdseatId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{task.taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{task.monitorDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{task.monitorLastDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{task.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{task.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{task.problemStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{task.subCreated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{task.parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{task.parentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{task.verifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{task.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{task.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{task.assessorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{task.assignorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{task.assignorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{task.reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{task.taskPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{task.taskMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE} )
mapper.select: select a.id, a.activity_id, a.activity_adseat_id, a.task_type, a.monitor_date,a.monitor_last_days,a.user_id, a.status,a.problem_status,a.sub_created, a.parent_id,a.parent_type, a.verify_time, a.create_time, a.update_time, b.activity_name, c.sample_pic_url,c.monitor_start,c.monitor_end,c.ad_seat_id, d.`name` as ad_seat_name, d.location as ad_seat_location, d.ad_code as ad_seat_code, d.lon, d.lat, d.region, d.street, d.province, d.city, d.ad_code_flag, d.memo, e.reason,e.pic_url1,e.pic_url2,e.pic_url3,e.pic_url4,e.create_time as feedback_time, e.problem,e.problem_other,e.lon as feedback_lon,e.lat as feedback_lat, f.start_time, f.end_time, f.assign_type from ad_monitor_task a left join ad_activity b on a.activity_id = b.id left join ad_activity_adseat c on a.activity_adseat_id = c.id left join ad_seat_info d on c.ad_seat_id = d.id left join ad_monitor_task_feedback e on e.monitor_task_id = a.id and e.`status` = 1 left join ad_monitor_user_task f on f.monitor_task_id = a.id where a.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and f.status = 1 order by a.update_time desc,a.id desc

select task.id,task.parent_id,task.parent_type,task.task_type,task.monitor_date,task.monitor_last_days,task.status, task.report_time, activity.`activity_name`, activity.`start_time`, activity.`end_time`, activity.`create_time`, `adseat`.`monitor_start`, `adseat`.`monitor_end`, `adseat`.`brand`, `adseat`.`sample_pic_url`, `seatinfo`.`province`, `seatinfo`.`city`, `seatinfo`.`region`, `seatinfo`.`street`, `seatinfo`.`location`, seatinfo.name, `media`.`media_name`, adseat.media_id from ad_monitor_task as task left join `ad_activity` as activity on task.`activity_id`=`activity`.id left join ad_activity_adseat as adseat on task.activity_adseat_id=adseat.id left join ad_seat_info as seatinfo on adseat.ad_seat_id =seatinfo.id left join ad_media as media on adseat.media_id=media.id where task.id=#{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select task.status, activity.activity_name, seatinfo.province, seatinfo.city, seatinfo.region, seatinfo.street, adseat.monitor_start, feedback.problem, feedback.pic_url1, feedback.pic_url2, feedback.pic_url3, feedback.pic_url4, feedback.problem_other, feedback.create_time feedbackcreatetime, feedback.status feedbackstatus, task.task_type, feedback.reason, feedback.seat_lon as lon, feedback.seat_lat as lat, feedback.lon as feedback_lon, feedback.lat as feedback_lat, feedback.id as feedback_id, feedback.pic_url1_status, feedback.pic_url2_status, feedback.pic_url3_status, feedback.pic_url4_status from ad_monitor_task_feedback feedback left join `ad_monitor_task` as task on task.id=feedback.monitor_task_id left join ad_activity as activity on task.activity_id=activity.id left join ad_activity_adseat as adseat on task.activity_adseat_id=adseat.id left join ad_seat_info as seatinfo on adseat.ad_seat_id=seatinfo.id where task.id=#{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and feedback.status = 1

select a.id, a.activity_id, a.activity_adseat_id, a.task_type,a.monitor_date,a.monitor_last_days, a.user_id, a.status,a.problem_status,a.sub_created,a.parent_id,a.parent_type, a.verify_time,a.create_time, a.update_time,a.assessor_id,a.assignor_id,a.assignor_time, b.pic_url1,b.pic_url2,b.pic_url3,b.pic_url4,b.create_time as feedbackcreatetime,b.reason, b.problem,b.problem_other,b.lon,b.lat,c.realname from ad_monitor_task a inner join ad_monitor_task_feedback b on a.id = b.monitor_task_id and b.`status` = 1 left join sys_user_execute c on a.user_id = c.id where a.parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.parent_type = #{parentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.id, a.activity_id, a.activity_adseat_id, a.task_type,a.monitor_date,a.monitor_last_days, a.user_id, a.status,a.problem_status,a.sub_created,a.parent_id,a.parent_type, a.verify_time,a.create_time, a.update_time,a.assessor_id,a.assignor_id,a.assignor_time, b.pic_url1,b.pic_url2,b.pic_url3,b.pic_url4,b.create_time as feedbackcreatetime,b.reason, b.problem,b.problem_other,b.lon,b.lat,c.realname from ad_monitor_task a inner join ad_monitor_task_feedback b on a.id = b.monitor_task_id and b.`status` = 1 left join sys_user_execute c on a.user_id = c.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update ad_monitor_task a set status = 1, update_time = sysdate() where a.activity_adseat_id = #{activitySeatId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.status = 7
update ad_monitor_task set status = case when monitor_last_days = 1 then 1 else 8 end where status = 7 and monitor_date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d')
update ad_monitor_task set status = 1 where status = 7 and monitor_date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, c.name as adSeatName FROM ad_monitor_task a LEFT JOIN ad_activity_adseat b ON a.activity_adseat_id = b.id LEFT JOIN ad_seat_info c ON b.ad_seat_id = c.id WHERE a.STATUS = 7 and a.monitor_date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update:
update ad_monitor_task set user_id = null, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, status = case when monitor_date <= date_add(date_add(now(),interval (2 - monitor_last_days) day),interval -#{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER} hour) then 1 else 8 end where id in #{s,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and status in (2, 6)

update ad_monitor_task set user_id = null, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id in #{s,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and status in (2, 6)

update ad_monitor_task set update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, status = 1 where status = 8 and monitor_date <= date_add(date_add(now(),interval (2 - monitor_last_days) day),interval -#{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER} hour)
mapper.select: select * from ( select a.task_type taskType, b.monitor_task_id, b.pic_url1 pic1, b.pic_url2 pic2, b.pic_url3 pic3, b.pic_url4 pic4, b.create_time date, b.problem, b.problem_other problemOther, c.realname userName from ad_monitor_task a left join ad_monitor_task_feedback b on b.monitor_task_id = a.id left join sys_user_execute c on c.id = a.user_id where a.activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.activity_adseat_id = #{activityAdseatId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.status = 4 order by b.create_time desc ) as t group by monitor_task_id

select
from ad_monitor_task where activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update ad_monitor_task a, ad_monitor_task_feedback b set a.status = 4, a.problem_status = 2, b.problem = null, b.problem_other = null where 1=1 and a.id = b.monitor_task_id and a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select c.lon, c.lat from ad_monitor_task a left join ad_activity_adseat b on a.activity_adseat_id = b.id left join ad_seat_info c on b.ad_seat_id = c.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.id, c.`name` as adSeatName FROM ad_monitor_task a LEFT JOIN ad_activity_adseat b ON a.activity_adseat_id = b.id LEFT JOIN ad_seat_info c ON b.ad_seat_id = c.id WHERE a.task_type = 5 AND a.activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select distinct b.username from ad_monitor_task a LEFT JOIN sys_user_execute b ON a.user_id = b.id where 1=1
and a.id in #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update ad_monitor_task a SET a.status=10 WHERE a.status in (1,2,6,8) and DATE_FORMAT(date_add(a.monitor_date,interval (a.monitor_last_days) day),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{nowDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
mapper.select:
select
from ad_monitor_task a WHERE a.status in (1,2,6,8) and DATE_FORMAT(date_add(a.monitor_date,interval (a.monitor_last_days) day),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{now,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

select distinct b.username from ad_monitor_task a LEFT JOIN sys_user_execute b ON a.user_id = b.id where 1=1
and a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from ad_monitor_task where activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
